  35. module wechat-api.api_url
    1. function wechat-api.api_url._shorturl (longUrl, callback)
    2. function wechat-api.api_url.shorturl (longUrl, callback)
  36. module wechat-api.api_user
    1. function wechat-api.api_user._batchGetUsers (openids, callback)
    2. function wechat-api.api_user._getFollowers (nextOpenid, callback)
    3. function wechat-api.api_user._getUser (options, callback)
    4. function wechat-api.api_user._updateRemark (openid, remark, callback)
    5. function wechat-api.api_user.batchGetUsers (openids, callback)
    6. function wechat-api.api_user.getFollowers (nextOpenid, callback)
    7. function wechat-api.api_user.getUser (options, callback)
    8. function wechat-api.api_user.updateRemark (openid, remark, callback)
  37. module wechat-api.util
    1. function wechat-api.util.make (host, name, fn)
    2. function wechat-api.util.postJSON (data)
    3. function wechat-api.util.wrapper (callback)

module wechat-api

function wechat-api (appid, appsecret, getToken, saveToken)

  • description and source-code
    wechat-api = function (appid, appsecret, getToken, saveToken) {
  this.appid = appid;
  this.appsecret = appsecret;
  this.getToken = getToken || function (callback) {
    callback(null, this.store);
  };
  this.saveToken = saveToken || function (token, callback) {
    this.store = token;
    if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production') {
      console.warn('Don\'t save token in memory, when cluster or multi-computer!');
    }
    callback(null);
  };
  this.endpoint = 'https://api.weixin.qq.com';
  this.mpPrefix = 'https://mp.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/';
  this.fileServerPrefix = 'http://file.api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/';
  this.defaults = {};
  // set default js ticket handle
  this.registerTicketHandle();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.AccessToken (accessToken, expireTime)

  • description and source-code
    AccessToken = function (accessToken, expireTime) {
  if (!(this instanceof AccessToken)) {
    return new AccessToken(accessToken, expireTime);
  }
  this.accessToken = accessToken;
  this.expireTime = expireTime;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common (appid, appsecret, getToken, saveToken)

  • description and source-code
    api_common = function (appid, appsecret, getToken, saveToken) {
  this.appid = appid;
  this.appsecret = appsecret;
  this.getToken = getToken || function (callback) {
    callback(null, this.store);
  };
  this.saveToken = saveToken || function (token, callback) {
    this.store = token;
    if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production') {
      console.warn('Don\'t save token in memory, when cluster or multi-computer!');
    }
    callback(null);
  };
  this.endpoint = 'https://api.weixin.qq.com';
  this.mpPrefix = 'https://mp.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/';
  this.fileServerPrefix = 'http://file.api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/';
  this.defaults = {};
  // set default js ticket handle
  this.registerTicketHandle();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.mixin (obj)

  • description and source-code
    mixin = function (obj) {
  for (var key in obj) {
    if (API.prototype.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
      throw new Error('Don\'t allow override existed prototype method. method: '+ key);
    }
    API.prototype[key] = obj[key];
  }
}
  • example usage
    ...



'use strict';

var API = require('./lib/api_common');
// æŽ¥å£è°ƒç”¨é¢‘æ¬¡é™åˆ¶
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_quota'));
// è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•æŽ¥å£
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_menu'));
// ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–èœå•æŽ¥å£
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_menu_custom'));
// åˆ†ç»„ç®¡ç†
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_group'));
// æ ‡ç­¾ç®¡ç†
...

function wechat-api.patch (functionName, apiUrl, override)

  • description and source-code
    patch = function (functionName, apiUrl, override) {
  if (typeof apiUrl !== 'string') {
    throw new Error('The second argument expect a type of string as the request url of wechat');
  }

  if (typeof functionName !== 'string') {
    throw new Error('The first argument expect a type of string as the name of new function');
  }

  if (API.prototype[functionName] || API.prototype['_' + functionName] ) {
    if (override !== true) {
      throw new Error('wechat-api already has a prototype named ['+ functionName + '], use "true" as third param to override it
or change your new function name.');
    } else {
      console.warn('wechat-api already has a prototype named ['+ functionName + '], will override the orignal one.');
    }
  }

  util.make(API.prototype, functionName, function (info, callback) {
    var hasMark = apiUrl.indexOf('?') >= 0;
    var url = apiUrl + (hasMark ? '&access_token=': '?access_token=') + this.token.accessToken;
    this.request(url, util.postJSON(info), wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    ...
å½“å¾®ä¿¡å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£å·²æ›´æ–°ï¼Œä½†æœ¬åº“æœªæ¥å¾—åŠæ›´æ–°ï¼Œè€Œåˆæƒ³ç”¨æ–°çš„å¾®ä¿¡ api æ—¶ï¼Œå¯è°ƒç”¨ patch æ–¹æ³•æ¥æ‰©å±•æ–°åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚
```js
var WechatAPI = require('wechat-api');
var api = new WechatAPI(appid, appsecret);

// æ‰©å±•æ–°api : updateInfo
// ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸ºæ‰©å±•çš„æ–°æ–¹æ³•åï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸ºæ­¤ api è°ƒç”¨çš„å¾®ä¿¡çš„ apiurl åœ°å€ï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ ä¸Š token
WechatAPI.patch("updateInfo", "https://api.weixin.qq.com/card/membercard
/updateuser");


// è°ƒç”¨åˆšæ‰©å±•çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸Žå…¶å®ƒ api æŽ¥å£æ–¹æ³•ä¸€æ ·ã€‚
api.updateInfo(jsonInfo, function (err, data, res) {
  // TODO
});
```

module wechat-api.AccessToken

function wechat-api.AccessToken (accessToken, expireTime)

  • description and source-code
    AccessToken = function (accessToken, expireTime) {
  if (!(this instanceof AccessToken)) {
    return new AccessToken(accessToken, expireTime);
  }
  this.accessToken = accessToken;
  this.expireTime = expireTime;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module wechat-api.AccessToken.prototype

function wechat-api.AccessToken.prototype.isValid ()

  • description and source-code
    isValid = function () {
  return !!this.accessToken && (new Date().getTime()) < this.expireTime;
}
  • example usage
    ...
// è°ƒç”¨ç”¨æˆ·ä¼ å…¥çš„èŽ·å–ticketçš„å¼‚æ­¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒèŽ·å¾—ticketä¹‹åŽä½¿ç”¨ï¼ˆå¹¶ç¼“å­˜å®ƒï¼‰ã€‚
that.getTicketToken('jsapi', function (err, cache) {
  if (err) {
    return callback(err);
  }
  var ticket;
  // æœ‰ticketå¹¶ä¸”ticketæœ‰æ•ˆç›´æŽ¥è°ƒç”¨
  if (cache && (ticket = new Ticket(cache.ticket, cache.expireTime)).isValid()) {
    // æš‚æ—¶ä¿å­˜ticket
    that.jsTicket = ticket;
    if (!retryed) {
      var retryHandle = function (err, data, res) {
        // é‡è¯•
        if (data && data.errcode && data.errcode === INVALID_TICKET_CODE) {
          return preRequestJSApi.call(that, method, args, true);

function wechat-api.api_card._addConsumer (username, locationId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _addConsumer = function (username, locationId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/consumer/add?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'username': username,
    'is_super_consumer': true
  };
  if (locationId) {
    data.location_id = locationId;
    data.is_super_consumer = false;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));

function wechat-api.api_card._createCardQRCode (info, expire_seconds, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _createCardQRCode = function (info, expire_seconds, callback) {
  if(typeof expire_seconds === 'function') {
    callback = expire_seconds;
    expire_seconds = null;
  }
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/qrcode/create?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    action_name: 'QR_'+Object.keys(info)[0].toUpperCase(),
    expire_seconds: expire_seconds,
    action_info: info
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_card._createQRCode (card, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _createQRCode = function (card, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/qrcode/create?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    action_name: 'QR_CARD',
    action_info: {
      card: card
    }
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

    'begin_date': beginDate,
    'end_date': endDate,
    'cond_source': source,

function wechat-api.api_card._getCards (offset, count, status_list, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getCards = function (offset, count, status_list, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/batchget?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    offset: offset,
    count: count
  };
  if (typeof status_list !== 'function') {
    data.status_list = status_list;
  } else {
    callback = status_list;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  };
  if (typeof cardId !== 'function') {
    data.card_id = cardId;
  } else {
    callback = cardId;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_card._unavailableCode (code, cardId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _unavailableCode = function (code, cardId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/code/unavailable?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    code: code
  };
  if (typeof cardId !== 'function') {
    data.card_id = cardId;
  } else {
    callback = cardId;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_card._updateCard (cardId, cardType, cardInfo, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateCard = function (cardId, cardType, cardInfo, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    card_id: cardId
  };
  data[cardType.toLowerCase()] = cardInfo;
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_card._updateCardStock (cardId, num, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateCardStock = function (cardId, num, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/modifystock?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    card_id: cardId
  };
  if (num > 0) {
    data.increase_stock_value = Math.abs(num);
  } else {
    data.reduce_stock_value = Math.abs(num);
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_card._uploadLogo (filepath, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _uploadLogo = function (filepath, callback) {
  var that = this;
  fs.stat(filepath, function (err, stat) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var form = formstream();
    form.file('buffer', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    var url = that.fileServerPrefix + 'media/uploadimg?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken;
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

/**
* ä¸Šä¼ Logo

* ```
* Callback:
*
* - `err`, è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¼‚å¸¸

module wechat-api.api_common

function wechat-api.api_common (appid, appsecret, getToken, saveToken)

  • description and source-code
    api_common = function (appid, appsecret, getToken, saveToken) {
  this.appid = appid;
  this.appsecret = appsecret;
  this.getToken = getToken || function (callback) {
    callback(null, this.store);
  };
  this.saveToken = saveToken || function (token, callback) {
    this.store = token;
    if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production') {
      console.warn('Don\'t save token in memory, when cluster or multi-computer!');
    }
    callback(null);
  };
  this.endpoint = 'https://api.weixin.qq.com';
  this.mpPrefix = 'https://mp.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/';
  this.fileServerPrefix = 'http://file.api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/';
  this.defaults = {};
  // set default js ticket handle
  this.registerTicketHandle();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.AccessToken (accessToken, expireTime)

  • description and source-code
    AccessToken = function (accessToken, expireTime) {
  if (!(this instanceof AccessToken)) {
    return new AccessToken(accessToken, expireTime);
  }
  this.accessToken = accessToken;
  this.expireTime = expireTime;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.mixin (obj)

  • description and source-code
    mixin = function (obj) {
  for (var key in obj) {
    if (API.prototype.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
      throw new Error('Don\'t allow override existed prototype method. method: '+ key);
    }
    API.prototype[key] = obj[key];
  }
}
  • example usage
    ...



'use strict';

var API = require('./lib/api_common');
// æŽ¥å£è°ƒç”¨é¢‘æ¬¡é™åˆ¶
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_quota'));
// è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•æŽ¥å£
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_menu'));
// ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–èœå•æŽ¥å£
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_menu_custom'));
// åˆ†ç»„ç®¡ç†
API.mixin(require('./lib/api_group'));
// æ ‡ç­¾ç®¡ç†
...

function wechat-api.api_common.patch (functionName, apiUrl, override)

  • description and source-code
    patch = function (functionName, apiUrl, override) {
  if (typeof apiUrl !== 'string') {
    throw new Error('The second argument expect a type of string as the request url of wechat');
  }

  if (typeof functionName !== 'string') {
    throw new Error('The first argument expect a type of string as the name of new function');
  }

  if (API.prototype[functionName] || API.prototype['_' + functionName] ) {
    if (override !== true) {
      throw new Error('wechat-api already has a prototype named ['+ functionName + '], use "true" as third param to override it
or change your new function name.');
    } else {
      console.warn('wechat-api already has a prototype named ['+ functionName + '], will override the orignal one.');
    }
  }

  util.make(API.prototype, functionName, function (info, callback) {
    var hasMark = apiUrl.indexOf('?') >= 0;
    var url = apiUrl + (hasMark ? '&access_token=': '?access_token=') + this.token.accessToken;
    this.request(url, util.postJSON(info), wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    ...
å½“å¾®ä¿¡å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£å·²æ›´æ–°ï¼Œä½†æœ¬åº“æœªæ¥å¾—åŠæ›´æ–°ï¼Œè€Œåˆæƒ³ç”¨æ–°çš„å¾®ä¿¡ api æ—¶ï¼Œå¯è°ƒç”¨ patch æ–¹æ³•æ¥æ‰©å±•æ–°åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚
```js
var WechatAPI = require('wechat-api');
var api = new WechatAPI(appid, appsecret);

// æ‰©å±•æ–°api : updateInfo
// ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸ºæ‰©å±•çš„æ–°æ–¹æ³•åï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°ä¸ºæ­¤ api è°ƒç”¨çš„å¾®ä¿¡çš„ apiurl åœ°å€ï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ ä¸Š token
WechatAPI.patch("updateInfo", "https://api.weixin.qq.com/card/membercard
/updateuser");


// è°ƒç”¨åˆšæ‰©å±•çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸Žå…¶å®ƒ api æŽ¥å£æ–¹æ³•ä¸€æ ·ã€‚
api.updateInfo(jsonInfo, function (err, data, res) {
  // TODO
});
```
...

module wechat-api.api_common.prototype

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._activateMembercard (info, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _activateMembercard = function (info, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/membercard/activate?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(info), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._addConsumer (username, locationId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _addConsumer = function (username, locationId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/consumer/add?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'username': username,
    'is_super_consumer': true
  };
  if (locationId) {
    data.location_id = locationId;
    data.is_super_consumer = false;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._addKfAccount (account, nick, password, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _addKfAccount = function (account, nick, password, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/add?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/add?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'kf_account': account,
    'nickname': nick,
    'password': md5(password)
  };

  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._authorizeDevices (devices, optype, productid, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _authorizeDevices = function (devices, optype, productid, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/authorize_device?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/authorize_device?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'device_num': devices.length,
    'device_list': devices,
    'op_type': optype
  };
  if (typeof productid !== 'function') {
    data.product_id = productid;
  } else {
    callback = productid;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._batchGetUsers (openids, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _batchGetUsers = function (openids, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/user/info/batchget?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {};
  data.user_list = openids.map(function (openid) {
    return {openid: openid, language: 'zh-CN'};
  });
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  var data = {
    ticket: ticket,
    device_id: deviceId,
    openid: openid
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));

    openid: openid
  }), wrapper(callback));

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._createCardQRCode (info, expire_seconds, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _createCardQRCode = function (info, expire_seconds, callback) {
  if(typeof expire_seconds === 'function') {
    callback = expire_seconds;
    expire_seconds = null;
  }
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/qrcode/create?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    action_name: 'QR_'+Object.keys(info)[0].toUpperCase(),
    expire_seconds: expire_seconds,
    action_info: info
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  this.request(url, postJSON(menu), wrapper(callback));
}

    'device_id_list': deviceIds

  • description and source-code
    _createGoodsGroup = function (groupName, productList, callback) {
  var data = {
    'group_detail': {
      'group_name': groupName,
      'product_list': productList && productList.length ? productList: []
    }
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/merchant/group/add?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._createGroup (name, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _createGroup = function (name, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/groups/create?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"group":{"name":"test"}}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/groups/create?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'group': {'name': name}
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._createLimitQRCode (sceneId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _createLimitQRCode = function (sceneId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/qrcode/create?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'action_name': 'QR_LIMIT_SCENE',
    'action_info': {'scene': {'scene_id': sceneId}}
  };
  // å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  if (typeof sceneId === 'string') {
    data.action_name = 'QR_LIMIT_STR_SCENE';
    data.action_info.scene = {'scene_str': sceneId};
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    }
  };

    'expire_seconds': expire,
    'action_name': 'QR_SCENE',
    'action_info': {'scene': {'scene_id': sceneId}}
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._deleteKfAccount (account, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _deleteKfAccount = function (account, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/del?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/del?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&kf_account=' + account;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._deleteMass (messageId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _deleteMass = function (messageId, callback) {
  var opts = {
    msg_id: messageId
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/delete?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._deleteTag (id, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _deleteTag = function (id, callback) {
  // httpè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼: POSTï¼ˆè¯·ä½¿ç”¨httpsåè®®ï¼‰
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/tags/delete?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"tag":{"id":108}}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/tags/delete?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'tag': {'id': id}
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._editTag (id, name, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _editTag = function (id, name, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/tags/update?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"tag":{"id":134, "name":"test"}}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/tags/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'tag': {
      'id': id,
      'name': name
    }
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    _getCardDataInfo = function (cardId, beginDate, endDate, source, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/datacube/getcardcardinfo?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'begin_date': beginDate,
    'end_date': endDate,
    'cond_source': source,
    'card_id': cardId
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getCardExt (param, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getCardExt = function (param, callback) {
  var apiTicket = this.wxCardTicket.ticket;
  var timestamp = createTimestamp();
  var signature = signCardExt(apiTicket, param.card_id, timestamp, param.code, param.openid, param.balance);
  var result = {
    timestamp: timestamp,
    signature: signature
  };

  result.code = param.code || '';
  result.openid = param.openid || '';

  if (param.balance) {
    result.balance = param.balance;
  }
  callback(null, result);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getCards (offset, count, status_list, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getCards = function (offset, count, status_list, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/batchget?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    offset: offset,
    count: count
  };
  if (typeof status_list !== 'function') {
    data.status_list = status_list;
  } else {
    callback = status_list;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getCode (code, cardId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getCode = function (code, cardId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/code/get?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    code: code
  };
  if (typeof cardId !== 'function') {
    data.card_id = cardId;
  } else {
    callback = cardId;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getFollowers (nextOpenid, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getFollowers = function (nextOpenid, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/user/get?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&next_openid=NEXT_OPENID
  if (typeof nextOpenid === 'function') {
    callback = nextOpenid;
    nextOpenid = '';
  }
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/user/get?next_openid=' + nextOpenid + '&access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getJsConfig (param, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getJsConfig = function (param, callback) {
  var that = this;
  var nonceStr = createNonceStr();
  var jsAPITicket = this.jsTicket.ticket;
  var timestamp = createTimestamp();
  var signature = sign(nonceStr, jsAPITicket, timestamp, param.url);
  var result = {
    debug: param.debug,
    appId: that.appid,
    timestamp: timestamp,
    nonceStr: nonceStr,
    signature: signature,
    jsApiList: param.jsApiList
  };

  // åˆ¤æ–­betaå‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¾®ä¿¡ç¡¬ä»¶å¼€å‘ç”¨
  // beta: true
  // å¼€å¯å†…æµ‹æŽ¥å£è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œæ³¨å…¥wx.invokeæ–¹æ³•
  if (param.beta) {
    result.beta = param.beta;
  }
  callback(null, result);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getMaterial (mediaId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getMaterial = function (mediaId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/material/get_material?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var opts = {
    type: 'POST',
    data: {'media_id': mediaId},
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    }
  };
  opts.timeout = 60000; // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
  this.request(url, opts, wrapper(function (err, data, res) {
    // handle some err
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var contentType = res.headers['content-type'];
    if (contentType === 'application/json') {
      var ret;
      try {
        ret = JSON.parse(data);
        if (ret.errcode) {
          err = new Error(ret.errmsg);
          err.name = 'WeChatAPIError';
        }
      } catch (ex) {
        return callback(ex, data, res);
      }
      return callback(err, ret, res);
    }
    // è¾“å‡ºBufferå¯¹è±¡
    callback(null, data, res);
  }));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getMaterialCount (callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getMaterialCount = function (callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/material/get_materialcount?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getMaterials (type, offset, count, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getMaterials = function (type, offset, count, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/material/batchget_material?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    type: type,
    offset: offset,
    count: count
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getMedia (mediaId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getMedia = function (mediaId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/media/get?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&media_id=' + mediaId;
  var opts = {
    timeout: 60000 // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
  };
  this.request(url, opts, wrapper(function (err, data, res) {
    // handle some err
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var contentType = res.headers['content-type'];
    if (contentType === 'application/json' || contentType === 'text/plain') {
      var ret;
      try {
        ret = JSON.parse(data);
        if (ret.errcode) {
          err = new Error(ret.errmsg);
          err.name = 'WeChatAPIError';
        }
      } catch (ex) {
        callback(ex, data, res);
        return;
      }
      return callback(err, ret, res);
    }
    // è¾“å‡ºBufferå¯¹è±¡
    callback(null, data, res);
  }));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getMemberCardUserInfo (info, callback)

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getOnlineCustomServiceList (callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getOnlineCustomServiceList = function (callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/customservice/getonlinekflist?access_token= ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/customservice/getonlinekflist?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getOpenID (deviceId, deviceType, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getOpenID = function (deviceId, deviceType, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/get_openid?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&device_type=DEVICE_TYPE&device_id=DEVICE_ID
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/get_openid?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&device_id=' + deviceId + '&device_type
=' + deviceType;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getOrdersByStatus (status, beginTime, endTime, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getOrdersByStatus = function (status, beginTime, endTime, callback) {
  var data = {};
  if (arguments.length === 1 && typeof status === 'function') {
    // (callback);
    callback = status;
  } else if (arguments.length === 2 && typeof beginTime === 'function') {
    callback = beginTime;
    if (typeof status === 'number') {
      // (status, callback)
      data.status = status;
    } else if (status instanceof Date) {
      data.begintime = Math.round(status.getTime() / 1000);
      data.endtime = Math.round(new Date().getTime() / 1000);
    } else {
      throw new Error('first parameter must be Number or Date');
    }
  } else if (arguments.length === 3 && typeof endTime === 'function') {
    callback = endTime;
    if (typeof status === 'number' && beginTime instanceof Date) {
      data.status = status;
      data.begintime = Math.round(beginTime.getTime() / 1000);
      data.endtime = Math.round(new Date().getTime() / 1000);
    } else {
      throw new Error('first parameter must be Number and second parameter must be Date');
    }
  } else if (arguments.length === 4) {
    data.status = status;
    data.begintime = Math.round(beginTime.getTime() / 1000);
    data.endtime = Math.round(endTime.getTime() / 1000);
  }
  var url = this.endpoint + '/merchant/order/getbyfilter?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/msgrecord/getmsglist?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  opts.msgid = opts.msgid || 1;
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/msgrecord/getmsglist?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getTagUsers (tagId, openid, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getTagUsers = function (tagId, openid, callback) {
  // httpè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼: POSTï¼ˆè¯·ä½¿ç”¨httpsåè®®ï¼‰
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/user/tag/get?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"tagid":108, "next_openid":"oDF3iYx0ro3_7jD4HFRDfrjdCM58"}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/user/tag/get?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'tagid': tagId,
    'next_openid': openid
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getTicket (type, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getTicket = function (type, callback) {
  if (typeof type === 'function') {
    callback = type;
    type = 'jsapi';
  }
  var that = this;
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&type=' + type;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(function(err, data) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    // è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œå› ç½‘ç»œå»¶è¿Ÿç­‰ï¼Œå°†å®žé™…è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´æå‰10ç§’ï¼Œä»¥é˜²æ­¢ä¸´ç•Œç‚¹
    var expireTime = (new Date().getTime()) + (data.expires_in - 10) * 1000;
    var ticket = new Ticket(data.ticket, expireTime);
    that.saveTicketToken(type, ticket, function (err) {
      if (err) {
        return callback(err);
      }
      callback(err, ticket);
    });
  }));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    _getTotalCardDataInfo = function (beginDate, endDate, source, callback) {

    'begin_date': beginDate,
    'end_date': endDate,
    'cond_source': source
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._getUser (options, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getUser = function (options, callback) {
  if (typeof options !== 'object') {
    options = {
      openid: options,
      lang: 'en'
    };
  }
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/user/info?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&openid=OPENID
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/user/info?openid=' + options.openid + '&lang=' + options.lang + '&access_token=' + this.token
.accessToken;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._massSend (opts, receivers, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _massSend = function (opts, receivers, callback) {
  var url;
  if (Array.isArray(receivers)) {
    opts.touser = receivers;
    url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/send?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  } else {
    if (typeof receivers === 'boolean') {
      opts.filter = {
        'is_to_all': receivers
      };
    } else {
      opts.filter = {
        'group_id': receivers
      };
    }
    url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/sendall?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  }
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/message/mass/sendall?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    'openid_list':openList,
    'tagid': tagId

  // httpè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼: POSTï¼ˆè¯·ä½¿ç”¨httpsåè®®ï¼‰
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/groups/members/update?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN

  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"openid":"oDF3iYx0ro3_7jD4HFRDfrjdCM58","to_groupid":108}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._previewVideo (openid, mediaId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _previewVideo = function (openid, mediaId, callback) {
  var opts = {
    'touser': openid,
    'mpvideo': {
      'media_id': mediaId
    },
    'msgtype': 'mpvideo'
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/preview?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._semantic (uid, opts, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _semantic = function (uid, opts, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/semantic/semproxy/search?access_token=YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/semantic/semproxy/search?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  opts.appid = this.appid;
  opts.uid = uid;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._sendCard (openid, card, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _sendCard = function (openid, card, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/custom/send?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var that = this;
  this.getCardExt(card, function (err, result) {
    var data = {
      'touser': openid,
      'msgtype':'wxcard',
      'wxcard': {
        'card_id': card.card_id,
        'card_ext': result
      }
    };
    that.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  //      },

  //        "description":"Is Really A Happy Day",
  //        "url":"URL",
  //        "picurl":"PIC_URL"
  //      }]
  //   }

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._sendTemplate (openid, templateId, url, data, callback, callback2)

  • description and source-code
    _sendTemplate = function (openid, templateId, url, data, callback, callback2) {
  /*
      duplicated interface `function (openid, templateId, url, topColor, data, callback)`
   */
  var apiUrl = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/template/send?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;

  if (typeof data === 'string') {
    data = callback;
    callback = callback2;
  }

  var template = {
    touser: openid,
    template_id: templateId,
    url: url,
    data: data
  };
  this.request(apiUrl, postJSON(template), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._setKfAccountAvatar (account, filepath, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _setKfAccountAvatar = function (account, filepath, callback) {
  // http://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/uploadheadimg?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&kf_account=KFACCOUNT
  var that = this;
  fs.stat(filepath, function (err, stat) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var form = formstream();
    form.file('media', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    var url = that.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/uploadheadimg?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken + '&kf_account=' +
account;
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

=' + this.token.accessToken;

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._transferMessage (deviceType, deviceId, openid, content, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _transferMessage = function (deviceType, deviceId, openid, content, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/transmsg?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/transmsg?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var info = {
    'device_type': deviceType,
    'device_id': deviceId,
    'open_id': openid,
    'content': new Buffer(content).toString('base64')
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(info), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._unavailableCode (code, cardId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _unavailableCode = function (code, cardId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/code/unavailable?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    code: code
  };
  if (typeof cardId !== 'function') {
    data.card_id = cardId;
  } else {
    callback = cardId;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    _updateCard = function (cardId, cardType, cardInfo, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    card_id: cardId
  };
  data[cardType.toLowerCase()] = cardInfo;
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateCardStock (cardId, num, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateCardStock = function (cardId, num, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/modifystock?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    card_id: cardId
  };
  if (num > 0) {
    data.increase_stock_value = Math.abs(num);
  } else {
    data.reduce_stock_value = Math.abs(num);
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateFeedback (openid, feedbackId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateFeedback = function (openid, feedbackId, callback) {
  var feedbackUrl = this.endpoint + '/payfeedback/update';
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/payfeedback/update?access_token=xxxxx&openid=XXXX&feedbackid=xxxx
  var data = {
    'access_token': this.token.accessToken,
    'openid': openid,
    'feedbackid': feedbackId
  };
  var opts = {
    dataType: 'json',
    type: 'GET',
    data: data,
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    }
  };
  this.request(feedbackUrl, opts, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateGoodsForGroup (groupId, addProductList, delProductList, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateGoodsForGroup = function (groupId, addProductList, delProductList, callback) {
  var data = {
    'group_id': groupId,
    'product': []
  };

  if (addProductList && addProductList.length) {
    addProductList.forEach(function (val) {
      data.product.push({
        'product_id': val,
        'mod_action': 1
      });
    });
  }

  if (delProductList && delProductList.length) {
    delProductList.forEach(function (val) {
      data.product.push({
        'product_id': val,
        'mod_action': 0
      });
    });
  }

  var url = this.endpoint + '/merchant/group/productmod?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateGoodsGroup (groupId, groupName, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateGoodsGroup = function (groupId, groupName, callback) {
  var data = {
    'group_id': groupId,
    'group_name': groupName
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/merchant/group/propertymod?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateGroup (id, name, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateGroup = function (id, name, callback) {
  // httpè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼: POSTï¼ˆè¯·ä½¿ç”¨httpsåè®®ï¼‰
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/groups/update?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"group":{"id":108,"name":"test2_modify2"}}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/groups/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'group': {'id': id, 'name': name}
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateKfAccount (account, nick, password, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateKfAccount = function (account, nick, password, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/add?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'kf_account': account,
    'nickname': nick,
    'password': md5(password)
  };

  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateStock (number, productId, sku, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateStock = function (number, productId, sku, callback) {
  var url;
  if (number > 0) {
    url = this.endpoint + '/merchant/stock/add?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  } else {
    url = this.endpoint + '/merchant/stock/reduce?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  }
  var data = {
    'product_id': productId,
    'sku_info': sku,
    'quantity': Math.abs(number)
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._updateSubmerchant (options, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateSubmerchant = function (options, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/card/submerchant/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'info': options
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._uploadImage (filepath, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _uploadImage = function (filepath, callback) {
  var that = this;
  fs.stat(filepath, function (err, stat) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var form = formstream();
    form.file('media', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    var url = that.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/media/uploadimg?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken;
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._uploadImageStream (req, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _uploadImageStream = function (req, callback) {
  var that = this;
  var url = that.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/media/uploadimg?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken;
  var opts = {
    dataType: 'json',
    type: 'POST',
    timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
    headers: req.headers,
    stream: req
  };
  delete opts.headers.host;
  that.request(url, opts, callback);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._uploadLogo (filepath, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _uploadLogo = function (filepath, callback) {
  var that = this;
  fs.stat(filepath, function (err, stat) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var form = formstream();
    form.file('buffer', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    var url = that.fileServerPrefix + 'media/uploadimg?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken;
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._uploadMaterial (filepath, type, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _uploadMaterial = function (filepath, type, callback) {
  var that = this;
  fs.stat(filepath, function (err, stat) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var form = formstream();
    form.file('media', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    var url = that.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/material/add_material?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken + '&type=' + type;
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });
}

    if (err) {
      return callback(err);

    var form = formstream();
    form.file('media', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    var url = that.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/media/upload?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken + '&type=' + type;
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });

  var opts = {
    dataType: 'json',
    type: 'POST',
    timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
    headers: req.headers,
    stream: req
  };
  delete opts.headers.host;
  that.request(url, opts, callback);

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._uploadPicture (filepath, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _uploadPicture = function (filepath, callback) {
  var basename = path.basename(filepath);
  var url = this.endpoint + '/merchant/common/upload_img?access_token=' +
    this.token.accessToken + '&filename=' + basename;
  var reader = fs.createReadStream(filepath);
  var opts = {
    dataType: 'json',
    type: 'POST',
    stream: reader
  };
  this.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype._uploadVideoMaterial (filepath, description, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _uploadVideoMaterial = function (filepath, description, callback) {
  var that = this;
  fs.stat(filepath, function (err, stat) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var form = formstream();
    form.file('media', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    form.field('description', JSON.stringify(description));
    var url = that.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/material/add_material?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken + '&type=video';
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    _verifyDeviceQRCode = function (ticket, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/verify_qrcode?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/verify_qrcode?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    ticket: ticket
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}

* {
*   "page_id": 34567
* }
* ```
* Examples:
* ```

* ```

* ç¼–è¾‘æ ‡ç­¾

* Examples:

* ```
* Callback:
*

* - `result`, è°ƒç”¨æ­£å¸¸æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¯¹è±¡
*
* Result:
...

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype.getAccessToken (callback)

  • description and source-code
    getAccessToken = function (callback) {
  var that = this;
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=' + this.appid + '&secret=' + this.appsecret;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(function (err, data) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    // è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œå› ç½‘ç»œå»¶è¿Ÿç­‰ï¼Œå°†å®žé™…è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´æå‰10ç§’ï¼Œä»¥é˜²æ­¢ä¸´ç•Œç‚¹
    var expireTime = (new Date().getTime()) + (data.expires_in - 10) * 1000;
    var token = AccessToken(data.access_token, expireTime);
    that.saveToken(token, function (err) {
      if (err) {
        return callback(err);
      }
      callback(err, token);
    });
  }));
  return this;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

/**

/**
* èŽ·å–æœ€æ–°çš„js api ticket
*
* Examples:
* ```
* api.getLatestTicket(callback);
* ```
* Callback:
*
* - `err`, èŽ·å–js api ticketå‡ºçŽ°å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶çš„å¼‚å¸¸å¯¹è±¡
* - `ticket`, èŽ·å–çš„ticket
*
* @param {Function} callback å›žè°ƒå‡½æ•°
...

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype.getLatestToken (callback)

  • description and source-code
    getLatestToken = function (callback) {
  var that = this;
  // è°ƒç”¨ç”¨æˆ·ä¼ å…¥çš„èŽ·å–tokençš„å¼‚æ­¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒèŽ·å¾—tokenä¹‹åŽä½¿ç”¨ï¼ˆå¹¶ç¼“å­˜å®ƒï¼‰ã€‚
  that.getToken(function (err, token) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var accessToken;
    // æœ‰tokenå¹¶ä¸”tokenæœ‰æ•ˆç›´æŽ¥è°ƒç”¨
    if (token && (accessToken = AccessToken(token.accessToken, token.expireTime)).isValid()) {
      return callback(null, accessToken);
    }
    // ä½¿ç”¨appid/appsecretèŽ·å–token
    that.getAccessToken(callback);
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype.getShakehbConfig (openid, lotteryId, key)

  • description and source-code
    getShakehbConfig = function (openid, lotteryId, key) {
  var params = {
    openid: openid,
    lottery_id: lotteryId,
    noncestr: Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 15)
  };

  var query = Object.keys(params).sort().map(function(key) {
    return key + '=' + params[key];
  }).join('&');

  query += '&key=' + key;
  params.sign = crypto.createHash('md5').update(query).digest('hex').toUpperCase();

  return params;
}
  • example usage
    ...
/**
* èŽ·å–çº¢åŒ…JSAPIå‚æ•°
* æŽ¥å£è¯´æ˜Ž:
* ç”¨äºŽåœ¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹é¡µé¢ä¸­ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨JSAPIæ¥è§¦å‘ç”¨æˆ·æŠ½çº¢åŒ…çš„æ“ä½œã€‚
* è¯¦æƒ…è¯·å‚è§ï¼šhttp://mp.weixin.qq.com/wiki/12/9738788d171724b080b52f6e41490cb4.html

*   "lottery_id": "5794560"
*   "noncestr": "5K8264ILTKCH16CQ2502SI8ZNMTM67VS"

*   "22222",

  this.uploadMPVideo(data, function (err, result) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    that.massSendVideo(result.media_id, receivers, callback);
  });

*   "timestamp" : "1369745073",

*   "sign_method" : "sha1"
* }
* ```

* ```
* Callback:
*
* - `err`, è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¼‚å¸¸
* - `result`, è°ƒç”¨æ­£å¸¸æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¯¹è±¡
*
* Result:
...

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype.preRequest (method, args, retryed)

  • description and source-code
    preRequest = function (method, args, retryed) {
  var that = this;
  var callback = args[args.length - 1];
  // è°ƒç”¨ç”¨æˆ·ä¼ å…¥çš„èŽ·å–tokençš„å¼‚æ­¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒèŽ·å¾—tokenä¹‹åŽä½¿ç”¨ï¼ˆå¹¶ç¼“å­˜å®ƒï¼‰ã€‚
  that.getToken(function (err, token) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var accessToken;
    // æœ‰tokenå¹¶ä¸”tokenæœ‰æ•ˆç›´æŽ¥è°ƒç”¨
    if (token && (accessToken = AccessToken(token.accessToken, token.expireTime)).isValid()) {
      // æš‚æ—¶ä¿å­˜token
      that.token = accessToken;
      if (!retryed) {
        var retryHandle = function (err, data, res) {
          // 40001 é‡è¯•
          if (data && data.errcode && data.errcode === 40001) {
            return that.preRequest(method, args, true);
          }
          callback(err, data, res);
        };
        // æ›¿æ¢callback
        var newargs = Array.prototype.slice.call(args, 0, -1);
        newargs.push(retryHandle);
        method.apply(that, newargs);
      } else {
        method.apply(that, args);
      }
    } else {
      // ä½¿ç”¨appid/appsecretèŽ·å–token
      that.getAccessToken(function (err, token) {
        // å¦‚é‡é”™è¯¯ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å›žè°ƒå‡½æ•°ä¼ å‡º
        if (err) {
          return callback(err);
        }
        // æš‚æ—¶ä¿å­˜token
        that.token = token;
        method.apply(that, args);
      });
    }
  });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * ```
 * @param {String} startDate èµ·å§‹æ—¥æœŸï¼Œæ ¼å¼ä¸º2014-12-08
 * @param {String} endDate ç»“æŸæ—¥æœŸï¼Œæ ¼å¼ä¸º2014-12-08
 * @param {Function} callback å›žè°ƒå‡½æ•°
 */
methods.forEach(function (method) {
  exports[method] = function (begin, end, callback) {
    this.preRequest(this['_' + method], arguments);
  };
});

/*!
* èŽ·å–åˆ†æžæ•°æ®çš„æœªå°è£…ç‰ˆæœ¬
*/
methods.forEach(function (method) {
...

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype.registerTicketHandle (getTicketToken, saveTicketToken)

  • description and source-code
    registerTicketHandle = function (getTicketToken, saveTicketToken) {
  if (!getTicketToken && !saveTicketToken) {
    this.ticketStore = {};
  }
  this.getTicketToken = getTicketToken || function (type, callback) {
    if (typeof type === 'function') {
      callback = type;
      type = 'jsapi';
    }
    callback(null, this.ticketStore[type]);
  };

  this.saveTicketToken = saveTicketToken || function (type, ticketToken, callback) {
    // å‘ä¸‹å…¼å®¹
    if (typeof ticketToken === 'function') {
      callback = ticketToken;
      ticketToken = type;
      type = 'jsapi';
    }

    this.ticketStore[type] = ticketToken;
    if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production') {
      console.warn('Dont save ticket in memory, when cluster or multi-computer!');
    }
    callback(null);
  };
}
  • example usage
    ...

/**
* å¤šå°æœåŠ¡å™¨è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡æ—¶ï¼ŒticketTokenéœ€è¦å¤–éƒ¨å­˜å‚¨å…±äº«ã€‚
* éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨æ­¤registerTicketHandleæ¥è®¾ç½®èŽ·å–å’Œä¿å­˜çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
*
* Examples:
* ```
* api.registerTicketHandle(getTicketToken, saveTicketToken);
* // getTicketToken
* function getTicketToken(type, callback) {
*  settingModel.getItem(type, {key: 'weixin_ticketToken'}, function (err, setting) {
*    if (err) return callback(err);
*    callback(null, setting.value);
*  });
* }
...

/**
* åˆ é™¤è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•
* è¯¦ç»†è¯·çœ‹ï¼š<http://mp.weixin.qq.com/wiki/16/8ed41ba931e4845844ad6d1eeb8060c8.html>
* Examples:
* ```
* api.removeMenu(callback);
* ```
* Callback:
*
* - `err`, è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¼‚å¸¸
* - `result`, è°ƒç”¨æ­£å¸¸æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¯¹è±¡
*
* Result:
...

function wechat-api.api_common.prototype.request (url, opts, callback)

  • description and source-code
    request = function (url, opts, callback) {
  var options = {};
  extend(options, this.defaults);
  if (typeof opts === 'function') {
    callback = opts;
    opts = {};
  }
  for (var key in opts) {
    if (key !== 'headers') {
      options[key] = opts[key];
    } else {
      if (opts.headers) {
        options.headers = options.headers || {};
        extend(options.headers, opts.headers);
      }
    }
  }
  urllib.request(url, options, callback);
}
  • example usage
    ...
   var opts = {
     dataType: 'json',
     type: 'POST',
     timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
     headers: form.headers(),
     stream: form
   };
   that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
 });
});

## Usage

```js
var WechatAPI = require('wechat-api');

var api = new WechatAPI(appid, appsecret);
api.updateRemark('open_id', 'remarked', function (err, data, res) {
  // TODO
});
```

* æ–°å¢žä¸´æ—¶ç´ æï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æœ‰å›¾ç‰‡ï¼ˆimageï¼‰ã€è¯­éŸ³ï¼ˆvoiceï¼‰ã€è§†é¢‘ï¼ˆvideoï¼‰å’Œç¼©ç•¥å›¾ï¼ˆthumbï¼‰

module wechat-api.api_custom_service

function wechat-api.api_custom_service._addKfAccount (account, nick, password, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _addKfAccount = function (account, nick, password, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/add?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/add?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'kf_account': account,
    'nickname': nick,
    'password': md5(password)
  };

  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_custom_service._closeKfSession (account, openid, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _closeKfSession = function (account, openid, callback) {
  //https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfsession/close?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfsession/close?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON({
    kf_account: account,
    openid: openid
  }), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_custom_service._createKfSession (account, openid, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _createKfSession = function (account, openid, callback) {
  //https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfsession/create?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfsession/create?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON({
    kf_account: account,
    openid: openid
  }), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_custom_service._deleteKfAccount (account, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _deleteKfAccount = function (account, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/del?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/del?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&kf_account=' + account;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    _getCustomServiceList = function (callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/customservice/getkflist?access_token= ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/customservice/getkflist?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}

  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfsession/getsession?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&openid=' + openid;

function wechat-api.api_custom_service._getRecords (opts, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getRecords = function (opts, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/msgrecord/getmsglist?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  opts.msgid = opts.msgid || 1;
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/msgrecord/getmsglist?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_custom_service._setKfAccountAvatar (account, filepath, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _setKfAccountAvatar = function (account, filepath, callback) {
  // http://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/uploadheadimg?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&kf_account=KFACCOUNT
  var that = this;
  fs.stat(filepath, function (err, stat) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    var form = formstream();
    form.file('media', filepath, path.basename(filepath), stat.size);
    var url = that.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/uploadheadimg?access_token=' + that.token.accessToken + '&kf_account=' +
account;
    var opts = {
      dataType: 'json',
      type: 'POST',
      timeout: 60000, // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
      headers: form.headers(),
      stream: form
    };
    that.request(url, opts, wrapper(callback));
  });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_custom_service._updateKfAccount (account, nick, password, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateKfAccount = function (account, nick, password, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/customservice/kfaccount/add?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/customservice/kfaccount/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'kf_account': account,
    'nickname': nick,
    'password': md5(password)
  };

  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

/**
* åˆ›å»ºä¼šè¯

* - `result`, è°ƒç”¨æ­£å¸¸æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¯¹è±¡

module wechat-api.api_datacube

function wechat-api.api_datacube._getArticleSummary (begin, end, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getArticleSummary = function (begin, end, callback) {
  var data = {
    begin_date: begin,
    end_date: end
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/datacube/' + method.toLowerCase() + '?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module wechat-api.api_device

function wechat-api.api_device._authorizeDevices (devices, optype, productid, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _authorizeDevices = function (devices, optype, productid, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/authorize_device?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/authorize_device?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'device_num': devices.length,
    'device_list': devices,
    'op_type': optype
  };
  if (typeof productid !== 'function') {
    data.product_id = productid;
  } else {
    callback = productid;
  }
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_device._bindDevice (deviceId, openid, ticket, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _bindDevice = function (deviceId, openid, ticket, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/bind?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/bind?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    ticket: ticket,
    device_id: deviceId,
    openid: openid
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    _createDeviceQRCode = function (deviceIds, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/create_qrcode?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/create_qrcode?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var info = {
    'device_num': deviceIds.length,
    'device_id_list': deviceIds
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(info), wrapper(callback));

  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));

  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/get_openid?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&device_id=' + deviceId + '&device_type
=' + deviceType;

function wechat-api.api_device._transferMessage (deviceType, deviceId, openid, content, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _transferMessage = function (deviceType, deviceId, openid, content, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/transmsg?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/transmsg?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var info = {
    'device_type': deviceType,
    'device_id': deviceId,
    'open_id': openid,
    'content': new Buffer(content).toString('base64')
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(info), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_device._transferStatus (deviceType, deviceId, openid, status, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _transferStatus = function (deviceType, deviceId, openid, status, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/device/transmsg?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/device/transmsg?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var info = {
    'device_type': deviceType,
    'device_id': deviceId,
    'open_id': openid,
    'msg_type': '2',
    'device_status': status
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(info), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module wechat-api.api_feedback

function wechat-api.api_feedback._updateFeedback (openid, feedbackId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateFeedback = function (openid, feedbackId, callback) {
  var feedbackUrl = this.endpoint + '/payfeedback/update';
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/payfeedback/update?access_token=xxxxx&openid=XXXX&feedbackid=xxxx
  var data = {
    'access_token': this.token.accessToken,
    'openid': openid,
    'feedbackid': feedbackId
  };
  var opts = {
    dataType: 'json',
    type: 'GET',
    data: data,
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    }
  };
  this.request(feedbackUrl, opts, wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_feedback.updateFeedback (openid, feedbackId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    updateFeedback = function (openid, feedbackId, callback) {
  this.preRequest(this._updateFeedback, arguments);
}
  • example usage
    ...
var util = require('./util');
var wrapper = util.wrapper;

/**
* æ ‡è®°å®¢æˆ·çš„æŠ•è¯‰å¤„ç†çŠ¶æ€
* Examples:
* ```
* api.updateFeedback(openid, feedbackId, callback);
* ```
* Callback:
*
* - `err`, è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¼‚å¸¸
* - `result`, è°ƒç”¨æ­£å¸¸æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¯¹è±¡
*
* Result:
...

module wechat-api.api_group

function wechat-api.api_group._createGroup (name, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _createGroup = function (name, callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/groups/create?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"group":{"name":"test"}}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/groups/create?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'group': {'name': name}
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_group._getGroups (callback)

  • description and source-code

  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/groups/get?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));

function wechat-api.api_group._moveUserToGroup (openid, groupId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _moveUserToGroup = function (openid, groupId, callback) {
  // httpè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼: POSTï¼ˆè¯·ä½¿ç”¨httpsåè®®ï¼‰
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/groups/members/update?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"openid":"oDF3iYx0ro3_7jD4HFRDfrjdCM58","to_groupid":108}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/groups/members/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'openid': openid,
    'to_groupid': groupId
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_group._removeGroup (groupId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _removeGroup = function (groupId, callback) {
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/groups/delete?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'group': { id: groupId}
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_group._updateGroup (id, name, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _updateGroup = function (id, name, callback) {
  // httpè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼: POSTï¼ˆè¯·ä½¿ç”¨httpsåè®®ï¼‰
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/groups/update?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  // POSTæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼šjson
  // POSTæ•°æ®ä¾‹å­ï¼š{"group":{"id":108,"name":"test2_modify2"}}
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/groups/update?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  var data = {
    'group': {'id': id, 'name': name}
  };
  this.request(url, postJSON(data), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

/**
* æ›´æ–°åˆ†ç»„åå­—
* è¯¦æƒ…è¯·è§ï¼š<http://mp.weixin.qq.com/wiki/0/56d992c605a97245eb7e617854b169fc.html>
* Examples:
* ```
* api.updateGroup(107, 'new groupname', callback);
* ```
* Callback:

* - `result`, è°ƒç”¨æ­£å¸¸æ—¶å¾—åˆ°çš„å¯¹è±¡

module wechat-api.api_ip

function wechat-api.api_ip._getIp (callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getIp = function (callback) {
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/getcallbackip?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/getcallbackip?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(callback));
}

/**
* èŽ·å–å¾®ä¿¡æœåŠ¡å™¨IPåœ°å€

module wechat-api.api_js

function wechat-api.api_js._getCardExt (param, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getCardExt = function (param, callback) {
  var apiTicket = this.wxCardTicket.ticket;
  var timestamp = createTimestamp();
  var signature = signCardExt(apiTicket, param.card_id, timestamp, param.code, param.openid, param.balance);
  var result = {
    timestamp: timestamp,
    signature: signature
  };

  result.code = param.code || '';
  result.openid = param.openid || '';

  if (param.balance) {
    result.balance = param.balance;
  }
  callback(null, result);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_js._getJsConfig (param, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getJsConfig = function (param, callback) {
  var that = this;
  var nonceStr = createNonceStr();
  var jsAPITicket = this.jsTicket.ticket;
  var timestamp = createTimestamp();
  var signature = sign(nonceStr, jsAPITicket, timestamp, param.url);
  var result = {
    debug: param.debug,
    appId: that.appid,
    timestamp: timestamp,
    nonceStr: nonceStr,
    signature: signature,
    jsApiList: param.jsApiList
  };

  // åˆ¤æ–­betaå‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¾®ä¿¡ç¡¬ä»¶å¼€å‘ç”¨
  // beta: true
  // å¼€å¯å†…æµ‹æŽ¥å£è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œæ³¨å…¥wx.invokeæ–¹æ³•
  if (param.beta) {
    result.beta = param.beta;
  }
  callback(null, result);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_js._getLatestTicket (callback)

    _getLatestTicket = function (callback) {
  callback(null, this.jsTicket);

  • example usage

function wechat-api.api_js._getTicket (type, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getTicket = function (type, callback) {
  if (typeof type === 'function') {
    callback = type;
    type = 'jsapi';
  }
  var that = this;
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken + '&type=' + type;
  this.request(url, {dataType: 'json'}, wrapper(function(err, data) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    // è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œå› ç½‘ç»œå»¶è¿Ÿç­‰ï¼Œå°†å®žé™…è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´æå‰10ç§’ï¼Œä»¥é˜²æ­¢ä¸´ç•Œç‚¹
    var expireTime = (new Date().getTime()) + (data.expires_in - 10) * 1000;
    var ticket = new Ticket(data.ticket, expireTime);
    that.saveTicketToken(type, ticket, function (err) {
      if (err) {
        return callback(err);
      }
      callback(err, ticket);
    });
  }));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

* @name getCardExt

* - `ticket`, èŽ·å–çš„ticket
*
* @param {Function} callback å›žè°ƒå‡½æ•°
...

}
  • example usage
    ...
    newargs.push(retryHandle);
    method.apply(that, newargs);
  } else {
    method.apply(that, args);
  }
} else {
  // ä»Žå¾®ä¿¡ç«¯èŽ·å–ticket
  that.getTicket(function (err, ticket) {
    // å¦‚é‡é”™è¯¯ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å›žè°ƒå‡½æ•°ä¼ å‡º
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    // æš‚æ—¶ä¿å­˜ticket
    that.jsTicket = ticket;
    method.apply(that, args);

function wechat-api.api_js.registerTicketHandle (getTicketToken, saveTicketToken)

  • description and source-code
    registerTicketHandle = function (getTicketToken, saveTicketToken) {
  if (!getTicketToken && !saveTicketToken) {
    this.ticketStore = {};
  }
  this.getTicketToken = getTicketToken || function (type, callback) {
    if (typeof type === 'function') {
      callback = type;
      type = 'jsapi';
    }
    callback(null, this.ticketStore[type]);
  };

  this.saveTicketToken = saveTicketToken || function (type, ticketToken, callback) {
    // å‘ä¸‹å…¼å®¹
    if (typeof ticketToken === 'function') {
      callback = ticketToken;
      ticketToken = type;
      type = 'jsapi';
    }

    this.ticketStore[type] = ticketToken;
    if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production') {
      console.warn('Dont save ticket in memory, when cluster or multi-computer!');
    }
    callback(null);
  };
}
  • example usage
    ...

/**
* å¤šå°æœåŠ¡å™¨è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡æ—¶ï¼ŒticketTokenéœ€è¦å¤–éƒ¨å­˜å‚¨å…±äº«ã€‚
* éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨æ­¤registerTicketHandleæ¥è®¾ç½®èŽ·å–å’Œä¿å­˜çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
*
* Examples:
* ```
* api.registerTicketHandle(getTicketToken, saveTicketToken);
* // getTicketToken
* function getTicketToken(type, callback) {
*  settingModel.getItem(type, {key: 'weixin_ticketToken'}, function (err, setting) {
*    if (err) return callback(err);
*    callback(null, setting.value);
*  });
* }
...

module wechat-api.api_mass_send

function wechat-api.api_mass_send._deleteMass (messageId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _deleteMass = function (messageId, callback) {
  var opts = {
    msg_id: messageId
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/delete?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_mass_send._getMassMessageStatus (messageId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _getMassMessageStatus = function (messageId, callback) {
  var opts = {
    'msg_id': messageId
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/get?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_mass_send._massSend (opts, receivers, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _massSend = function (opts, receivers, callback) {
  var url;
  if (Array.isArray(receivers)) {
    opts.touser = receivers;
    url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/send?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  } else {
    if (typeof receivers === 'boolean') {
      opts.filter = {
        'is_to_all': receivers
      };
    } else {
      opts.filter = {
        'group_id': receivers
      };
    }
    url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/sendall?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  }
  // https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/message/mass/sendall?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function wechat-api.api_mass_send._previewImage (openid, mediaId, callback)

  • description and source-code
    _previewImage = function (openid, mediaId, callback) {

    'touser': openid,
    'image': {
      'media_id': mediaId
    },
    'msgtype': 'image'
  };
  var url = this.endpoint + '/cgi-bin/message/mass/preview?access_token=' + this.token.accessToken;
  this.request(url, postJSON(opts), wrapper(callback));
}

function wechat-api.api_mass_send.massSendMPVideo (data, receivers, callback)

  • description and source-code
    massSendMPVideo = function (data, receivers, callback) {
  var that = this;
  // è‡ªåŠ¨å¸®è½¬è§†é¢‘çš„media_id
  this.uploadMPVideo(data, function (err, result) {
    if (err) {
      return callback(err);
    }
    that.massSendVideo(result.media_id, receivers, callback);
  });
}

/**
* ä¸Šä¼ å¤šåª’ä½“æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æœ‰å›¾ç‰‡ï¼ˆimageï¼‰ã€è¯­éŸ³ï¼ˆvoiceï¼‰ã€è§†é¢‘ï¼ˆvideoï¼‰å’Œç¼©ç•¥å›¾ï¼ˆthumbï¼‰
